          <title>
            <string language="en">Colour change in phenolphthalein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe Änderung im Phenolphthalein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement de couleur de phénol-phtaléine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança da cor no phenolphthalein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento di colore in fenolftaleina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγή χρώματος phenolphthalein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio del color en phenolphthalein</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the molecular structures of phenolphthalein when its pH is changed by addition of hydroxide or hydrogen ions. The phenolphthalein solution turns pink at higher pH.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">colour change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydroxide ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phenolphthalein</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die molekularen Strukturen 
des Phenolphthaleins, wenn sein pH durch Hinzufügung des Hydroxids 
oder der Wasserstoffionen geändert wird. Die 
Phenolphthaleinlösung dreht Pink bei höherem pH.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les structures 
moléculaires de la phénol-phtaléine quand son pH est changé par 
l'ajout des ions d'hydroxyde ou d'hydrogène. La solution de 
phénol-phtaléine tourne le rose à un pH plus élevé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as estruturas molecular 
do phenolphthalein quando seu pH é mudado pela adição de íons do 
hydroxide ou de hidrogênio. A solução do phenolphthalein gira
a cor-de-rosa em um pH mais elevado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le strutture 
molecolari di fenolftaleina quando il relativo pH è cambiato tramite 
l'aggiunta degli ioni di idrogeno o dell'idrossido. La soluzione
della fenolftaleina gira il colore rosa ad più alto pH.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μοριακές δομές 
phenolphthalein πότε το pH του από η προσθήκη αλλάζει των 
ιόντων υδροξειδίου ή υδρογόνου. Η phenolphthalein λύση 
γίνεται ρόδινη στο υψηλότερο pH.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las estructuras 
moleculares del phenolphthalein cuando su pH es cambiado por la 
adición de los iones del hidróxido o de hidrógeno. La 
solución del phenolphthalein da vuelta a color de rosa en un pH más 
alto.</string>
          </description>
